item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: Stella Blues Bar

Stella Blues is a cool new bar that just opened on Crown Street. Let's be friendly-like and welcome them to the neighborhood. So come ye in your multitudes to say, "hello neighbor!" (and throw back a few).

Stella's helping us out with the throwing back part by offering $1 off drafts and glasses of wine. They're even going to throw in some free wings for us to nibble on.

Your contact for the evening is Ben: 203-554-5144
item.name: Monday Happy Hour at Stella Blues Bar
